question: [File: aptos-core/storage/backup/backup-cli/src/backup_types/transaction/restore.rs] [Function: loaded_chunk_stream()] [Future Composition] Can the nested future composition at lines 388-398 create reference cycles or memory leaks in the async runtime? (Low)
